content: Has any body payed attention to what will be voted on monday 23 at 3pm est?? Congress has already passed this bill and the senate will vote on bill 3588 or 3577 which will in efect allow hime to set up this countrys wide armed police force and other measures. Sen Ried is not allowing a rerading of the bill nor has any public notice appeared anywhere that I can see. Has anyone thought KGB or Hitlers second little army. If this is true sarting today a chain e-mail needs to start to our reps to squash this bill by 3pm monday. From what I have seen Mr. Odbama is using the same game plan that Hugo Chavez is using. use double speak drive up inflation gain control of the money market turn citizens against the capitablelists gain control of major industries and then nationalize them control the energy supplies(stop all exploration of any source, mining, etc) eliminate term limits ( bill has been submitted to this effect) Control the media (fairness doctrine) the popular press does not realize it is next. form a state police force to control any one who is against him. iT APPEARS THAT THE HOO RAH RAH IS A SMOKE SCREEN TO DISTRACT US AND TURN US AGAINST THE CAPITAL SYSTEM THAT ENABLED US TO STAY FREE. POOR PEOPLE DO NOTHIRE PEOPLE. Promise rewards and power to those who support him ands then attack the 1st and 2nd amendments. I could go on with more but wish to keep this readable remember ONLY A FREE SOCIETY CAN OR WILL VOTE ITSELF INTO POLITICAL AND ECONOMIC SLAVERY i AM NOT A CONSPIRACY NUT AND HOPE THE ABOVE IS NOT TRUE BUT EVERY THING POINTS TO IT. LOOK AT OUR PRIOR FREE NEIGHBOR TO THE SOUTH. iT IS TIME TO ACT AND THEN VOTE THE RASCALS OUT
